#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
const int maxn = 1e3+10;
int n,t[maxn],k;
long long lo,hi,mid,tt,ans;
int main(){
    scanf("%d%d",&k,&n);
    for (int i=1; i<=k; i++) scanf("%d",&t[i]);
    lo=0;hi=ans=1e12;
    while (lo<=hi){
        mid=(lo+hi)>>1;tt=0;
        for (int i=1; i<=k; i++) tt+=1LL*(mid/t[i]);
        if (tt>=n){
            ans=min(ans,mid);
            hi=mid-1;
        } else lo=mid+1;
    }
    cout<<ans;
}
